name: Attuned_Sting_of_the_Manticore_D
display_name: Attuned Sting of the Manticore D
display_fullname: Boosts.Attuned Sting of the Manticore D
display_help: Enhances the damage of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}%, reduces interrupt time by {Boost.Attrib.InterruptTime.Scale}% and and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%.
power_short_helps: Enhances Damage and Reduces Interrupt and Recharge Time
